'''Radiant Spincrystal 129''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] ''[[Submerged Trumpet]]'' in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located on top of a purple coral shelf by the music puzzle to release Scylla's chain in the [[Sea of Bygone Eras]], [[Fontaine]].
